articles.title: Jayson Tatum says he played with fractured wrist vs. Warriors in NBA Finals - NBC Sports
articles.description: Jayson Tatum didn't have a great NBA Finals and he disclosed Sunday that an injury might have played a part in his struggles.
articles.content:
By his standards, Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum had a disappointing NBA Finals against the Warriors.
Tatum, the Celtics' leading scorer during the 2021-22 regular season, struggled at times again… [+2757 chars]

articles.title: In 'really special moment,' Jorge Mateo leads Baltimore Orioles past Boston Red Sox in front of Little League World Series players - ESPN
articles.description: Baltimore's Jorge Mateo lined a bases-loaded double in the eighth inning, driving in three runs and sparking the Orioles to a 5-3 win over the Red Sox on Sunday in front of hundreds of cheering Little League World Series players from around the world.
